Miriam Suzanne » Grids

Grid Configuration

Related

Accoutrement Core [external]

$grid-sizes (map)

scss 
$grid-sizes: (
  '_space': minmax(0, 1fr),
  '_quarter': minmax(0, size('quarter')),
);

$grid-lines (map)

scss 
$grid-lines: (
  '_lines-l': full-start left-start,
  '_lines-m': left-end midpoint right-start,
  '_lines-r': right-end full-end,
);

$grid-left (map)

scss 
$grid-left: (
  '_content-l': [content-start] #_space,
  '_edge-l': size('grid-margin') #_content-l,
  '_main-l': #_quarter [half-left] #_quarter,
  '_left': #_edge-l [main-start] #_main-l,
);

$grid-right (map)

scss 
$grid-right: (
  '_content-r': #_space [content-end],
  '_edge-r': #_content-r size('grid-margin'),
  '_main-r': #_quarter [half-right] #_quarter,
  '_right': #_main-r [main-end] #_edge-r,
);

$grid-areas (map)

scss 
$grid-areas: (
  '_main': #_main-l [#_lines-m] #_main-r,
  '_main-sm': #_main-l [midpoint] #_main-r,
  '_content': #_content-l [main-start] #_main [main-end] #_content-r,
  '_full': #_edge-l [main-start] #_main [main-end] #_edge-r,
  '_full-sm-main': [main-start right-start] #_main-sm [left-end main-end],
  '_full-sm': #_edge-l #_full-sm-main #_edge-r,
);

$grid-layouts (map)

scss 
$grid-layouts: (
  'content': [#_lines-l] #_content [#_lines-r],
  'full': [#_lines-l] #_full [#_lines-r],
  'small': [#_lines-l] #_full-sm [#_lines-r],
  'main': [#_lines-l main-start] #_main [main-end #_lines-r],
  'main-left': [#_lines-l ] #_left [#_lines-m] #_main-r [main-end #_lines-r],
  'main-right': [#_lines-l main-start] #_main-l [#_lines-m] #_right,
  'left': [#_lines-l] #_left [#_lines-m main-end #_lines-r],
  'right': [#_lines-l main-start #_lines-m] #_right [#_lines-r],
);
